did.unittitle: Brooklyn street scenes glass plate negatives
did.abstract: Images in the collection show street scenes of residential and domestic life in late 19th century Brooklyn. Brownstones and cobblestone streets with horse-drawn carriages and streetcars are featured prominently.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The Brooklyn street scenes glass plate negatives dates from circa 1875 to 1899 and contains 16 items. Images in the collection show street scenes of residential and domestic life in late 19th century Brooklyn. Brownstones and cobblestone streets with horse-drawn carriages and streetcars are featured prominently. Two images of Manhattan and Troy, N.Y. are also included in the collection.
